item.description:
With Tax Day just passed, it is time for us to collect and hoard silver and gold for our kingdoms.  Come destress from taxes by managing your own estate in the game of Dominion.

This will be a single elimination tournament where cards from any and all expansions could show up!  Think you've mastered strategies for this game?  Come and prove it.  The exact format of the tournament will depend on how many people come, but we'll have food and other side games (Ping Pong anyone?) for people eliminated, and small prizes for the top placers.

I'm also trying a new time by having a mini-meetup in the evening.  

 

 

----------------------------

This is a Mini-Meetup. Please be respectful of others who may want to RSVP and allow new or previously inactive members get a slot if they want.  Thanks. See this discussion for more details.

----------------------------

 

Food theme: 

The theme for this event will be "medieval". Please bring a food item to share with the group that is "medieval"; consider this your entry fee for the tournament.  Interpret the theme however you want. I will give out a prize for the coolest food item that fits the theme.   I will try to have also generic, healthy snacks on hand for all diets.

 

About the location: 
This event will be hosted at a private residence, convieniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: Dominion Tournament
